Summary: small object circling randomly around larger, elongated, object
divs: Sighting DetailsGetting ready to go for an afternoon run. Looked up while stretching an immediately noticed the two objects. At first I thought the larger object was a plane, but then I realized that I could see an elongated section, but no wings, no tail, no lights, no contrails, no doppler-shifted engine noise. Absolute clear daylight sky. Very high up. Elongated cylindrical object moving steadily from NW to SE. Smaller object moving randomly around the larger object: right to left, pause - hesitate, the circle left to right, pause - hesitate, then moved back to front as if examining the larger object. Smaller object continued this random movement for the duration that I could see the objects. No lights. No sounds. No contrails. Far away but appeared to have metallic color. Smaller object was making "impossible" direction changes and pausing. I wasn't frightened or alarmed. Just amazed that having spent years with my telescope looking at planets, nebulae, satellites, Iridium flares, comets, etc..I finally see what I can only describe as a UFO in broad daylight.
Object Flight Path: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
